def Load(widget): from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import EntityState if widget.ProviderWidget <> None and (widget.ProviderWidget.Entity == None or widget.ProviderWidget.Entity.State == EntityState.Initialized): widget.Hidden = True return
import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes") clr.AddReference("Benner.Erp.Web") from Benner.Erp.Web import AuthorizationHelper from Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes.Contratos import CNContrato from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import BreadcrumbEntityHandle, WesSiteMapNode
widget.Hidden = CNContrato.AssinantesContratoMostrarTab(widget.Breadcrumb.Parent.Entity.Handle) podeInserir = AuthorizationHelper.PodeInserirEntidade(widget.View.EntityDefinition.Name) breadcrumbList = WesSiteMapNode.GetBreadcrumbEntityHandles() contrato = breadcrumbList.Find(lambda found:found.EntityDefinitionName.Equals("CN_CONTRATOS"))
if (not contrato.IsNull()): podeAlterar = CNContrato.PodeAlterarFilialFormulario(contrato.Handle.Value) widget.View.Commands["CMD_NOVO"].Visible = podeAlterar and podeInserir widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = podeAlterar widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = podeAlterar
